title: Number of expressways gas stations , by provider in France 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Company is 8.0.
The difference of Number of gas stations between the highest and lowest Company is 113.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is appeared to be the highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Company is 8.0.
The difference of Number of gas stations between the highest and lowest Company is 113.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The Number of gas stations is highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
There is a difference of 113.0 between the maximum Company Total and minimum Company Dyneff.
Company Total is higher than any other Companys with value 121.0, followed by Avia, and Shell. Down to Company Dyneff with the lowest value 8.0.
Company Eni, and Esso have a similar Number of gas stations that is 46.0.
The Company Total tends to be 2.46 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Companys, we get total 443.0.
